text: int main ( ) { int test , n , * a , k , i , j , count = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & test ) ; while ( test -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; a = ( int * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } count = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = i ; j < n - 1 ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ j ] > a [ j + 1 ] ) { break ; } } if ( j > i ) { count ++ ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , count + n ) ; } return 0 ; }
